meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about the teens numbers like thirteen and nineteen.
meanings.sent2: During the teens, many people experience growth spurts.
meanings.sent3: The teens numbers decided to have a party, but twenty wasn't invited.
meanings.sent4: The teens numbers stood out in the sequence like colorful beads on a string.
meanings.sent5: The teens numbers are like a bridge connecting single digits to twenties.

meanings.definition: Young people between the ages of 13 and 19.
meanings.sent1: During the teens, many students start high school.
meanings.sent2: The teens in our neighborhood enjoy hanging out at the park.
meanings.sent3: The teens at the party were all dancing to the same song.
meanings.sent4: The energy of the teens was like a burst of fireworks in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the teens filled the room with joy and excitement.
